title: DNA to Pre MRNA to mRNA

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes an event during step 2 in the simplified model above?

choices.label: A new RNA molecule is synthesized using a DNA template.
A new polypeptide is synthesized using an RNA template.
Thymine nucleotides in an RNA molecule are replaced with uracil nucleotides.
Noncoding sequences are removed from a newly synthesized RNA molecule.

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
